Description_lang: Tred'ova tethers a target to multiple allies, inflicting $s1 Shadow damage every $t1 sec. All damage taken is duplicated to tethered player as Shadow damage.Moving more than $s3 yards from the player dispels the $@spellname322648 from that ally.
AuraDescription_lang: $s1 Shadow damage inflicted every $t1 sec.You duplicate all damage taken to all tethered players as Shadow damage.Move away from bonded player to dispel.
